Articles.Content: are there any easter eggs on minmus, or is it just a barren ball of frozen jet pee?
You could search for Minmus easter eggs 123kde, there is at least one, also, Minmus is really a ball of mint ice cream, but the Kerbals are forbidden from taking spoons with them on Minmus flights
lol, ok then. i will continue my search!

You could search for Minmus easter eggs 123kde, there is at least one, also, Minmus is really a ball of mint ice cream, but the Kerbals are forbidden from taking spoons with them on Minmus flights

Now it all makes sense. That is why the Kerbals really want to go to space. Green icecream!
